titleInfo.title: 'APPENDIX IV. MAP ENCLOSURE TO HE THE HIGH COMMISSIONER'S DESPATCH NO. C.0/120'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: printed on paper.Dimensions: 180 x 350mm, on sheet 230 x 360mm.

mods.abstract: Map showing the boundary regions of Syria, Iraq, Turkey and Iran. The map displays the old Ottoman boundary; the boundaries established by the Treaty of SÃ¨vres; and four proposed boundaries. It also shows topographical features, towns and villages.
